newsitem.title: USA: Turner could cut jobs after Time merger - report.
newsitem.headline: Turner could cut jobs after Time merger - report.

text.p: Turner Broadcasting System Inc could eliminate up to 1,000 jobs when it merges with Time Warner Inc this fall, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reported on Friday.
The cuts would save the new merged company $100 million and eliminate overlapping positions in finance, auditing, legal affairs, public relations and other areas.
Turner Broadcasting has about 8,200 employees, 5,000 of whom are based in Atlanta. The cuts are suggested in preliminary reports by a transition team studying the merger, the newspaper said.
The merger deal has a value of about $6.5 billion.
